item.title: Cheaper Alternatives to Prepaid Phone Cards
item.description: Prepaid phone cards are everywhere, tempting you with low per-minute rates. While convenient, they often come with hidden costs that make them more expensive than they seem. These cards entice you with their accessibility and seemingly attractive rates, but the fine print reveals additional charges like connection fees, minimum call charges, and monthly maintenance fees, even if you rarely use the card. These fees can quickly add up, turning a seemingly cheap call into a costly expense.
